description:
Upon opening, the software searches for available scanners and FREEZES in the process of doing so!!

Always had to kill the process to close the program. Never got to evaluate it as it always froze upon opening/launching it.

Under Ubuntu 14.04 I had two OCR programs available, both of which worked (YAGF and another, I can't recall the name).
LIOS crashes the OS in 18.04 every time I try, and needs fixing. I have to hard reboot every time!
Is there any tested OCR program available for use with Ubuntu 18.04?
summary: Crashes Ubuntu 18.04 every time. Needs hard reboot!

description: After seeing the other 2 reviews at the time of this writing, I was curious whether Pop!_OS had addressed issues of this program freezing as the reviewers reported under Ubuntu 18.04. Apprently it has as the program ran without issue on Pop!_OS 19.10. I did not test the functions, but at least it ran and quit without freezing or crashing the OS.
